data.actual_result: You are able to edit Expired Sub Behavior and Grace Period while Syncing. You cannot do this on Desktop
data.expected_result: You should either be kicked out of the screen to the main Integrations screen, or unable to edit the Expired Sub Behavior or Grace Period
data.short_description: When refreshing Twitch Integration settings, you are able to edit most of the options while Force Syncing
data.steps_to_repro: - Become Twitch Partner/Affiliate - Go to Server Settings > Integrations and integrate your Affiliated account - Force Sync subscribers
